item.title: Invisible Stories
item.description: Exibitions - Software development Europa Sofia, Bulgaria | National Gallery - 2020 Sarajevo, Bosnia and Herzegovina | National Gallery - 2019 Gyumry, Armenia | Art Gallery - 2019 America Messico | 2020 Argentina | 2019 Cile | 2019 (https://nationalgallery.bg/exhibitions/italy-the-invisible-stories/)

item.title: Skills
item.description: Web Development I build web apps with Python + (Django, Flask), with Node + (Express, Angular, React, Svelte), with Go + (Hugo, Gin Gonic, Gorilla toolkit), with Php + Drupal. I do front-end development using Angular, React, Svelte with (Bootstrap, Material UI), Internet Mapping with Geoserver, PostGIS and (Openlayers, Leaflet), Spatial Data Analysis with QGIS. Capable of doing basic web production server setup: Ubuntu/Centos with basic security, PostgreSQL/PostGIS MySql/MaridDB MongoDB/BoltDB/ Elasticsearch, nginx + (Gunicorn, uWSGI), Docker & Kubernetes.

item.title: About
item.description: Full Stack Developer, Web GIS Developer, Project Manager for a wide range of business applications. Skilled with the agile methodology for software development. Interested in Relational Database design, Data Analysis, Multimedia Interactive Applications, Remote Monitoring, Home Automation, Machine Learning. You can download my resume here
